publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2329 Christina McKelvie: Lanarkshire Children’s Games—That the Parliament congratulates North and South Lanarkshire councils on beating off competition from Singapore and Daegu in South Korea to stage the International Children’s Games in 2011; notes that up to 2,000 athletes aged 12 to 15 years, as well as coaches and officials from more than 70 countries, will begin preparations for the event; further notes that track and field, football, golf, tennis and rowing are among the sports to take place at venues such as Hamilton Palace sports ground, Strathclyde Park, the John Wright sports centre and Dollan Baths in East Kilbride, and warmly congratulates the bid team, John Scott and all the staff at New Lanarkshire Limited for working together to bring this fantastic event to Lanarkshire.
S3M-2329 Lanarkshire Children’s Games (lodged on 14 July 2008) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-2329 Lanarkshire Children’s Games (lodged on 14 July 2008) Keith Brown*
